definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">100</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="explode"><field name="mode">BREAK</field><value name="x"><block type="entity_pos_x"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_pos_y"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_pos_z"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">8</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block><block type="coord_x" x="212" y="178"/><block type="coord_y" x="500" y="180"/><block type="coord_z" x="782" y="182"/></xml>
